col2_html.content:
A True Destination Among Times Square Hotels

We’re modern, but not everything-is-beige modern. The opposite, in fact, which you’ll notice the moment you enter the lobby. The jaw-dropping aquarium, the innovative lighting design, and the sculptural chandeliers all let you know you’ve landed someplace special.

We’re showy—this is the Theater District, after all—but we’re also welcoming. Our rooms and suites will enfold you in luxurious bedding, Bose sound systems, and indulgent bathrobes. Our premium bath amenities will leave you refreshed after the hubbub of Manhattan streets.

Our location puts all that makes New York amazing at your fingertips. Visit off-the-beaten-path restaurants in Hell’s Kitchen, stroll through Central Park, or hop on one of the nearby subway lines and visit Brooklyn or renowned museums. It’s easy from here, and our concierge can help ease the way. At the end of the day (or night), cozy up with a cocktail in our beautiful lobby bar.
